API
============

The ScreenShoot object contains 3 public functions

* *get_screen(self, url, ids = None, xpaths = None, path = None, df = None)*

    Parameters:

    - *url* - url to the webpage (including http protocol)
    - *ids* - list of ids on the web page
    - *xpaths* - list of xpath on the web page
    - *path* - path to save directory
    - *df* - format, not supported

* *get_data(self, url, conf = None, filename = None)*

    Parameters:

    - *url* - url to the webpage (including http protocol)
    - *conf* - configuration of storing elements, store only elements with ids if conf is in [None, "ID"]; store everything (ids and classes) if conf is in ["ALL"]
    - *filename* - a location of a file where to store collected data

* *close(self)*

    Should be called in the end. It close the webdriver.
